info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52377
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52377
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14266
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14266
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 01 May 2022 04:06:59 GMT Etag: "8f7-5d31e3d50bc5a-gzip" Last-Modified: Tue, 14 Dec 2021 17:08:34 GMT Server: Apache Vary: Accept-Encoding Via: 1.1 alproxy Classe à 12

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13542
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13542
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=XR9l5aITkoCsdLjLYWAGp7atmvVZPbBRJCUOio6fLBM"
classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"
